short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automates reviewers assignment from codeowners file in gitlab reviews

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Creates a button in the reviewers section in gitlab review pages that, when pressed, automatically assigns the code reviewers according to the codeowners file.
Gitlab currently does not provide a feature to auto-assign code reviewers, so the extension is helpful to cover the gap.
